argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dprd2d.1 | |- ( ph -> Rel A ) |
| 2 |  | dprd2d.2 | |- ( ph -> S : A --> ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | dprd2d.3 | |- ( ph -> dom A C_ I ) |
| 4 |  | dprd2d.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ i e. I ) -> G dom DProd ( j e. ( A " { i } ) |-> ( i S j ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | dprd2d.5 | |- ( ph -> G dom DProd ( i e. I |-> ( G DProd ( j e. ( A " { i } ) |-> ( i S j ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | dprd2d.k | |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_dprd2da | |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) |
| 8 | 6 | #P_dprdspan | |- ( G dom DProd S -> ( G DProd S ) = ( K ` U. ran S ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( G DProd S ) = ( K ` U. ran S ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_relssres | |- ( ( Rel A /\ dom A C_ I ) -> ( A |` I ) = A ) |
| 11 | 1, 3, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( A |` I ) = A ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_imaeq2d | |- ( ph -> ( S " ( A |` I ) ) = ( S " A ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( S : A --> ( SubGrp ` G ) -> S Fn A ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fnima | |- ( S Fn A -> ( S " A ) = ran S ) |
| 15 | 2, 13, 14 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> ( S " A ) = ran S ) |
| 16 | 12, 15 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ph -> ran S = ( S " ( A |` I ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_unieqd | |- ( ph -> U. ran S = U. ( S " ( A |` I ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( K ` U. ran S ) = ( K ` U. ( S " ( A |` I ) ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_ssid | |- I C_ I |
| 20 | 19 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> I C_ I ) |
| 21 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 20 | #P_dprd2dlem1 | |- ( ph -> ( K ` U. ( S " ( A |` I ) ) ) = ( G DProd ( i e. I |-> ( G DProd ( j e. ( A " { i } ) |-> ( i S j ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 9, 18, 21 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( G DProd S ) = ( G DProd ( i e. I |-> ( G DProd ( j e. ( A " { i } ) |-> ( i S j ) ) ) ) ) ) |
